summary: Student grading system application with customizable grade boundaries and subject-subgroup configuration
architectural_notes: PE is an elective subject for all subgroups
Mathematics is only for commerce subgroup

existing_features.title: Update the grading system thresholds to: 90-100 = A+, 80-89 = A, 70-79 = B+, 60-69 = B, 50-59 = C+, 40-49 = C, with grades below 40 continuing the pattern (D+, D, E+, E, F)
Configure PE (Physical Education) as an elective subject available for all subgroups across all grades
Restrict Mathematics subject to only the Commerce subgroup, removing it from Science and Humanities subgroups

projectName: Fix grading thresholds and update subject-subgroup rules
